title: Safer Routes Program - Schools
description:
A. SUMMARY This dataset was created to show the locations of participating schools in the SRTS program (from 2009 to present).

B. METHODOLOGY  Manually updated using posted list of schools on http://sfsaferoutes.org/

C. UPDATE FREQUENCY  Annually 

D. OTHER CRITICAL INFO  N/A

columns.name: objectid
columns.description: An ObjectID is a unique, not null integer field used to uniquely identify rows in tables in a ESRI geodatabase

columns.name: ADDRESS
columns.description: school address

columns.name: STREETNAME
columns.description: street name

columns.name: SUPDIST
columns.description: supervisorial district

columns.name: GRADE
columns.description: school grade levels

columns.name: GRADE_CAT
columns.description: school grade level category

columns.name: PUBLIC_
columns.description: whether school is public or private

columns.name: SCHOOL
columns.description: school name for labeling

columns.name: FULL_NAME
columns.description: full school name

columns.name: SCHOOLZONE
columns.description: 1 = 15 mph school zone present

columns.name: F2009_2010
columns.description: participant = school participated in the SRTS 2009-2010 school year

columns.name: F2010_2011
columns.description: participant = school participated in the SRTS 2010-2011 school year

columns.name: F2011_2012
columns.description: participant = school participated in the SRTS 2011-2012 school year

columns.name: F2012_2013
columns.description: participant = school participated in the SRTS 2012-2013 school year

columns.name: F2013_2014
columns.description: participant = school participated in the SRTS 2013-2014 school year

columns.name: F2014_2015
columns.description: participant = school participated in the SRTS 2014-2015 school year

columns.name: F2015_2016
columns.description: participant = school participated in the SRTS 2015-2016 school year

columns.name: F2016_2017
columns.description: participant = school participated in the SRTS 2016-2017 school year

columns.name: FORMERNAME
columns.description: former school name

columns.name: F2017_2018
columns.description: participant = school participated in the SRTS 2017-2018 school year

columns.name: NHOOD
columns.description: neighborhood

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was last processed

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was loaded into the Open Data Portal

columns.name: analysis_neighborhood
columns.description: Neighborhood associated with the midpoint or centroid of the geographic feature

columns.name: supervisor_district
columns.description: Current supervisor district associated with the midopint or centroid of the geographic feature
